arts.ttl: “Part of football heritage”: Elche star heaps praise on Barcelona’s teenage sensation
arts.sum: Ahead of Barcelona’s home game against Elche, Rafa Mir has spoken warmly about Lamine Yamal, calling the teenage sensation a part of ‘football heritage’.
